preference.name: CATIA_node_use_to_compute_ass_geom_attr
preference.preference_description: Customize settings to consider geometrical attributes of the assembly node models during the calculation of assemblies geometrical attributes (true) or leaf parts only (false) by setting the following variable within Teamcenter Preferences. The default value is true
